## DynamicFormOptions interface

Represents different options for customizing form behaviour

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DynamicFormOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [allowPristine?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicformoptions.allowpristine.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Can the form submit in pristine state? |
|  [disableControlsWithValue?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicformoptions.disablecontrolswithvalue.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> If true, all controls with an initial value are disabled |
|  [getRawValue?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicformoptions.getrawvalue.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to true to get the raw form value on submit. This includes the values of disabled controls. |
|  [noRenderDisabledControls?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicformoptions.norenderdisabledcontrols.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to true if disabled controls shouldn't be rendered. |
|  [onlineRequired?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicformoptions.onlinerequired.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Should the form require the user to be online before submitting? |
